title: MYNTRA users beware!
selftext:
Ordered these pair of jeans from Myntra and received it today. While trying them on I noticed the tag mentions the price as Rs 1499/- I thought I must have misread the price on the app as 1199 instead of 1999/- but no I was right. Immediately called the customer care, they said I will have to return the product n they will refund the entire amount which is a shame since I really liked the product fit and would be happy if they could've refunded the extra amount. 

So please check your tags when shopping!
comments: Thanks! Will check tags next time!
They attached the wrong tag to the wrong product. The tag says "trousers" whereas it's clearly a pair of jeans. Mistakes happen. They didn't over charge you. The tag is wrong.
